body.p: In addition, some respondents suggested that the Board should require disclosure of non‑financial information, including:

li.p: rights to explore for, develop and produce wasting resources;
disclosures about stages after exploration and evaluation; and

the number of years since exploration started, and an estimation of the time remaining until a decision could be made about the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.
